conclusion: Analyze the U-I graph to determine output and total power of the power source.
The straight line a is the U-I graph of the power source, and the curve b is the U-I graph of the small light bulb.
The intersection point of the straight line a and the curve b indicates the operating point of the circuit.
At the intersection, U = 2V and I = 2A.
The output power is given by P_output = U × I.
The total power is given by P_total = E × I, where E is the electromotive force (emf).
From the graph, the emf E is 3V (where the U-I graph of the power source intersects the U-axis).
The output power of the power source is 4W.
The total power of the power source is 6W.
